data.name: Mortal Darkness
data.detailed_description:
You have been summoned by Ilidan, a town elder to investigate the attack on a small farming village nearby. You discover that there is much more to this rouge attack and there is something much more sinister at play. Adventure through the world meeting its quirky and sometimes strange people, battling hoards of enemies and saving the kingdom from the sinister forces.

"We" are a one man studio from South of middle earth.

Enemies:
There is a variety of challenges that await you. Some enemies have unique buffs and spells that can be utilized to slay you.


Character Development:
Stats:
Strength – Directly linked to the damage the player can deal.
Agility – Increased movement speed.
Cunning – Increased mana and health rejuvenation.
Intelligence – increased rate of experience gained.
Magic – Increased magic abilities/hit points.

Characters:
Barbarian – Cunning and agile, but pack a lot of strength. He has discovered many skills and exotic items throughout his adventures. He wears an amulet stolen from an orc witchdoctor which allows him to blink to nearby locations in order to evade enemy damage.
Orc – This warrior has been shunned from his tribe by murdering one of the chieftains’ guards. These creatures are brutal and strong but are not as agile as other classes. They use a classic fighting style and evades enemy damage by using a Rolling technique.
Witchdoctor – The creature could strike fear in anyone’s eyes. They excel in their magical abilities and possess much higher cunning and intelligence than other classes. This warrior teleports to evade damage.
Archer – Agile and cunning. This warrior is a quick mover and specializes in ranged attacking using bows, however can still use normal weapons to a lesser extent. The warrior can transform into a spirit briefly to avoid damage from enemies.

Skills:
Over 50 different buffs and abilities can be utilized based on the character you have chosen. Gain experience points from your travels and use them to unlock a variety of strengths and abilities. Each character class will have different spells available to them. Mix and match which abilities to equip together in your spells bar and find the perfect combination for you and your warrior.


Items:
Collect and experiment with over 200 items. There are over 60 different weapons and shields, as well as more than 100 other items that range from crafting items, buff items or elixirs.
Crafting:
Items can be collected and used for crafting, however, crafting works a little bit differently. Crafting can be done by Traders. You can supply them the crafting items and they will in return give you an item back based on the “ingredients”. This is semi-random. Players can choose the category of weapon, buff item, or potion.

data.short_description: “One grim dawn and noble I wake, The darkness is rampant, our oath shall break. A noble warrior soon shall rise, and clear the air of the darkened skies.”
